data.title: Hello Vietnam Chords by Johnny Wright
data.meta_description: Hello Vietnam by Johnny Wright chords. One accurate version. Play along with original audio
data.text:
Capo 4th fret

Standard (EADGBE)

Intro

DKiss Gme goodbye and write me while I'm gone

GoodA7- bye, my sweetheart, Hello Viet-D nam.

A7America has heard the bugleD call

And youA7 know it involves us, one anD all

IG don't suppose that war will everD end

There'sA7 fighting that will break us up a-D gain.

Chorus

Good-G bye, my darling, Hello Viet-D nam

AG hill to take, a battle to beA7 won

KissG me goodbye and write me while I'mD gone

Good-A7 bye, my sweetheart, Hello Viet-D nam.

A ship is waiting for us at the dock

America has trouble to be stopped

We must stop Communism in that land

Or freedom will start sliping thru our hands.

NARRATION: (Chorus sung in background)

I hope and pray someday the world will learn

That fires we don't put out, will bigger burn

We must save freedom now, at any cost

Or someday, our own freedom will be lost.

TAG:

DKiss Gme goodbye and write me while I'mD gone

Good-A7 bye, my sweetheart, Hello Viet-D nam.

100 ALL-TIME COUNTRY HALL OF FAME HITS
